title: Tomato and herb pizza base
ingredients: ['350ml (12 fl oz) warm water (45 C)', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 3/4 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '300g (11 oz) plain flour', '5 tablespoons wholemeal flour', '4 tablespoons fine cornmeal (polenta)', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil leaves', '1 teaspoon dried rosemary, chopped', '100g (4 oz) passata', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
